About me

Welcome to my data-driven journey. Iâ€™m fascinated by how artificial intelligence and statistics can reveal hidden patterns in the world around us, from the pulse of human health to the rhythm of everyday life.


To me, every dataset is a story waiting to be understood. Each model, each graph, is a step toward connecting insight with impact, turning numbers into knowledge that helps people live better.

Work experience

Assistant Statistician
Bauer Research Group, University of Michigan, Ann arbor, MI
May 2025 - Present

Collaborated with PI to define research objectives and translate scientific questions into appropriate statistical analyses.
Designed and executed statistical analyses using logistic regression, ANOVA, andcorrelation methods to assess health outcomes and demographic associations.
Produced statistical summaries and figures (TLFs) in SAS and ensured reproducibility of results across analyses.
Delivered statistical tables and figures supporting a manuscript on self-regulation and family feeding behaviors.

Data Analyst
Center for Academic Innovation, Ann arbor, MI
Sep 2024 - Aug 2025

Analyzed large-scale educational datasets using R and SQL to identify equity gaps in student performance across demographic groups, generating actionable insights for institutional policy.
Built interactive R dashboards to visualize performance trends, improving data accessibility and evidence-based decision-making for non-technical stakeholders.
Automated SQL and R-based ETL pipelines for 1M+ student records, cutting dashboard refresh time by 45% and improving workflow scalability.
Utilized Git-based version control and collaborative workflows to maintain analytical integrity and support cross-functional research teams.

2023 - 2025

Skills

Core technical and analytical skills that empower my research and data-driven work.

Statistical Modeling

Regression, ANOVA, survival analysis, mixed models, and hypothesis testing.

Machine Learning

Supervised and unsupervised learning, feature selection, model evaluation, and explainability.

Deep Learning

Neural networks for image and tabular data; transfer learning and model tuning.

Programming

R, Python, SQL, and SAS for data cleaning, wrangling, automation, and reproducible research workflows.

Data Visualization

Creating clear, interpretable dashboards and figures using ggplot2, Plotly, Power BI, and RShiny.

Data Engineering

Experience with data pipelines, EHR and wearable data integration, and relational database management.

Communication and Collaboration

Translating analytical results into actionable insights; effective teamwork across multidisciplinary teams.

Attention to detail

Diligent in maintaining precision and quality in all analytic and research work.

Adaptability

Quick to learn new methods, technologies, and analytical frameworks in evolving data environments.

Elevating visual narratives

Embark on a design journey that surpasses pixels, entering a realm of imagination. Explore my portfolio, where passion and creativity converge to shape enthralling visual narratives.

Project 1:
Cardiovascular Risk Prediction Prototype

Go to the project

Project Summary:

Developed an interactive prototype demonstrating how wearable and behavioral data can predict cardiovascular risk using machine-learning approaches such as XGBoost. The goal was to visualize data-driven health insights in an intuitive, interpretable way.

Role:

Built the entire pipeline from concept to front-end demo. Designed the interactive dashboard in AstroWind + React, showing real-time risk probability and feature importance bars (SHAP-style).

Project 2:
Event poster for art & music festival

Go to the project

Description:

Designed a captivating event poster for an art and music festival, "ArtWave Fusion," aiming to showcase the synergy between visual art and music genres.

Role:

Translated the festival's creative theme into a visually striking poster. Used bold typography, vibrant colors, and abstract elements to depict the fusion of art and music. Ensured the design captured the festival's vibrant atmosphere.

Project 3:
E-commerce website redesign for fashion brand

Go to the project

Description:

Redesigned the e-commerce website for an eco-conscious fashion brand, GreenVogue. The objective was to align the brand's online presence with its sustainable ethos and improve user experience.

Role:

Conducted a thorough analysis of the brand's values and customer base to inform the design direction. Created a visually appealing interface with intuitive navigation, highlighting sustainable materials, and integrating a user-friendly shopping experience.
